Name: Attendance application
Text: A full stack cloud based application that allows students to log in with qr codes. Has multiple parts, including a mobile layer, web layer, and a database layer. This application was designed for a software development course.
Title: Attendance Application

Name: Mugan Trial
Text: Mugan Trial is a game about surviving procedually generated dungeons to try and fight your way to the surface. This game was made for a second year game development course.
Title: Mugan Trial

Name: Judge
Text: This is a final project that is being made to automatically test students code against test cases for labs to mark them. This project is a full stack application that uses sandboxing ideas to run code in a safe environment.
Title: Judge Application
